articles.author: ABDOULIE JOHN, JESSICA DONATI
articles.title: In a global first, Gambia could reverse its ban on female genital cutting - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lawmakers in Gambia are voting Monday on legislation that seeks to repeal a 2015 ban on female genital cutting. That would make the West African nation the first country anywhere to make such a reversal. The procedure also has been called female genital mutil…
articles.content: ERREKUNDA, Gambia (AP) Lawmakers in Gambia will vote Monday on legislation that seeks to repeal a 2015 ban on female genital cutting, which would make the West African nation the first country anywhe… [+2891 chars]
